title: We are the Ocean - Live at Bush Hall London Acoustic
description:
This a Live Acoustic Recording of We are the Ocean in London's Bush Hall Aug 2011

The recording is of the first time they performed acoustically live

It also still contains previous frontman Dan Brown before he left the next year.


The recording is taken from the bonus disc of the re-issue of their second album

I attended the show myself, and it was a great and funny experience

Very glad they recorded it. 


Some of the track re-workings are a tad strange, but its a great thing to own.


All tracks in 320kps


Total duration 47:49


Track listing:


1. What it Feels Like

2. These Days I Have Nothing

3. Playing With My Heart

4. Runaway

5. Trials & Tribulations

6. This is Called my Home

7. Overtime is a Crime

8. Now and Then

9. Confessions

10. Nothing Good Has Happened Yet

11. The Waiting Room#



Like i said this is a wonderful recording, i love it.

Its nice to have this to remember Dan as he's left now

Also Nothing Good Has Happened Yet, even acoustically is awesome! haha



Enjoy! :)
